ResourceHeader.ResourceName: C2 Waves of High frequency and Sounder for Probing of Electron density by Relaxation (WHISPER) Electric Spectral Power Density, Cluster Active Archive Parameter (CP), PT52S Data

RevisionEvent.Note: Initial release of metadata, ADAPT generated, LFB

ResourceHeader.Description: The Wave of HIgh frequency and Sounder for Probing of Electron density by Relaxation (WHISPER) performs the measurement of the electron density on the four satellites of the CLUSTER project. The two main purposes of the WHISPER experiment are to record the natural waves and to make a diagnostic of the electron density using the sounding technique. The various working modes and the fourier transforms calculated on board provide a good frequency resolution obtained in the bandwidth 2-83 kHz. Onboard data compression by the Digital Wave Processing (DWP) intrument allows a good dynamic and level resolution of the electric signal amplitude.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the WHISPER team and the ESA Cluster Archive in any publication based upon use of this data. Digital Object Identifier for the WHISPER archive: https://doi.org/10.5270/esa-6stdo07

AccessURL.Name: FTPS from SPDF (not with most browsers)
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data in CDF Format via ftps from SPDF

AccessURL.Name: HTTPS from SPDF
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data in CDF Format via https from SPDF

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb
AccessURL.Description: Access to ASCII, CDF, and Plots via NASA/GSFC CDAWeb

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator P. Henri. Please acknowledge the Data Providers and CDAWeb when using these Data.

Parameter.Name: Delta
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: time_tags__C2_CP_WHI_ACTIVE
Parameter.Description: Half the sampling duration + uncertainty of the time tags (in seconds)

Parameter.Name: Electric Spectral Power Density
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: time_tags__C2_CP_WHI_ACTIVE
Parameter.Caveats: Fill values can be present (1) in the first/last values when only a part of the on-board spectrum values is sent to ground and/or (2) inside the spectrum when a specific mode is used, sending only one value (the highest signal) for each pair of consecutive frequency bins

Parameter.Name: Spectral Frequencies
Parameter.Description: Frequencies for the 512 elements of the fixed size spectrum

Parameter.Name: Table Number
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: time_tags__C2_CP_WHI_ACTIVE
Parameter.Description: Frequency Swept Table Number between 0 and 127

Parameter.Name: Sounding Interval
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: time_tags__C2_CP_WHI_ACTIVE
Parameter.Description: Time interval between 2 emission pulses in seconds
Parameter.Caveats: 13.3 ms (1 unit); 26.6 ms (2 units); 40 ms (3 units); 66.6 ms (5 units); 106.6 ms (8 units); 8.5 s (40 units+2106.66 ms waiting+256 units+2446.66 ms waiting); 125 ms (6 units+45 ms waiting); 250 ms (14 units+63.34 ms waiting)

Parameter.Name: Emission/Reception Delay
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: time_tags__C2_CP_WHI_ACTIVE
Parameter.Caveats: Acquisition time interval is defined as the delay between the leading edge of the emission pulse and the starting edge of the associated reception (acquisition time interval)

Parameter.Name: Gain Change Number
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: time_tags__C2_CP_WHI_ACTIVE
Parameter.Description: Number of gain changes during the acquisition

Parameter.Name: Mantissa
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: time_tags__C2_CP_WHI_ACTIVE
Parameter.Description: First part of the compressed value which is a fixed point integer defined in the compression algorithm

Parameter.Name: Exponent
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: time_tags__C2_CP_WHI_ACTIVE
Parameter.Description: Second part of the compressed value
